message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. This gives you a good chunk, Bob, and avoids us losing value to inflation.
Alice, your offer was too low. I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share to avoid further losses from inflation, but it needs to be fair. This is my counter-offer.
Bob, I understand you want a fair deal, but your offer was too skewed in your favor.  This offer is a compromise â€“ let's settle this before inflation eats away at your share.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. We're both losing out because of inflation.  I'm coming up slightly from my last offer, but this is my final one. Let's end this now and both get something.
